revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Bountiful WiFi |model=BWRG1000 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B005CJL9EU |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/05/2005 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TDK-BWR54G1 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2316A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2316A |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=high power,amplifier |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=bwifi - 0 |default_ssid_regex=^bwifi - 0$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:AC |oui_eth=00:14:AC |default_ch= }} [http://www.bountifulwifi.com:82/Products/Bountiful_Router_1000G/Overview.aspx Product page] "BWIFI", "PCB-WIFI-AP1-1.0", "(C) 2005" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Bountiful_BWRG500 On the DD-WRT wiki] Per the [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices DD-WRT Supported Devices table], this router has 4MB Flash and 16MB RAM. {{TechInfoDepot|Bountiful_BWRG1000}}
[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/bountiful-bwrg1000-80211bg-wireless-router-913 On SpeedGuide.net] Default credentials are per the manual. Presumed 00:14:AC ('''Bountiful WiFi''') OUI based on the FCC label. ==Images== File:Bountiful BWRG1000 1.jpg|angled front File:Bountiful BWRG1000 2.jpg|back File:Bountiful BWRG1000 3.jpg|back File:Bountiful BWRG1000 4.jpg [[Has images::external| ]]
